body:
Well, it works in qemu. But it still fails on GCE and the buildlet never comes up after 90 seconds:

```
ante:build $ gomote create linux-amd64-sid
2015/02/17 17:38:23 Sent create request. Waiting for operation.
2015/02/17 17:38:53 Instance created.
Error running create: failed to create VM: buildlet didn't come up at https://104.154.94.133 in 1m30s
```

@saljam, any ideas? I suppose I could rebuild with sshd in the VM and see if I could at least ssh to it and see what's up.
